import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import logoPlus from '../foto/plus.svg'; import {Container, Row , Col, Card, CardGroup, Modal, Button, Form} from 'react-bootstrap'; import LightSpeed from 'react-reveal/LightSpeed'; import axios from 'axios'; function MomentKeluarga () { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); return ( <>
{setShow(true)}}>Apa Moment Yang Terjadi Hari Ini? {setShow(false)}} animation={false} aria-labelledby="contained-modal-title-vcenter" centered size="lg">


{/* Today */} {/* {kumpulan.map((asi) => { return( ) })} */} ) } export default MomentKeluarga;
